welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.subtitle: Technical test as a Frontend Web developer
welcome.message: The project is fully functional and there are no backend connections, except for this screen, which makes a request to a public url, for detailed information about the <~> characters. In this way, although I did not build the backend, I want to demonstrate the knowledge I have to handle REST-type services.
welcome.messageTwo: The creation and deletion of accounts, as well as the saving of characters to the favorites list, is handled and persisted through <~>, which allows to simulate requests as if it were connected to a backend to obtain and delete data.
welcome.name: Name

MyFavorites.title: My favorites
MyFavorites.message: Add something of your favorite tastes in this section, keep in mind that everything that is added will be linked to the user's account and will be stored in the <~> of the browser, simulating the saving and obtaining of your information from a database data.
MyFavorites.emptyMessage: You have not yet added anything of your favorite tastes of this section.

deleteElement.title: Delete item
deleteElement.message: You are about to delete an element from this section, if you continue you will not be able to reverse the process.

errorLoadInfo.title: Error getting the information
errorLoadInfo.message: There was an error loading the information, please try again.

invalidUser.title: Invalid user
invalidUser.message: This user already exists, try a different user.

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.message: You are about to delete your account, if you continue you will lose all your information and you will not be able to undo this change.
